verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:5
verses.text: And he was king in Jeshurun, when the heads of the people and the tribes of Israel were gathered together.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:6
verses.text: Let Reuben live, and not die; and let not his men be few.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:7
verses.text: And this is the blessing of Judah: and he said, Hear, Lord, the voice of Judah, and bring him unto his people: let his hands be sufficient for him; and be thou an help to him from his enemies.
